definition: second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: It's the next best thing to witnessing an actual blastoff.
sentences.chinese: 这是仅次于目睹火箭真实升空的最佳选择。

sentences.english: Airfoil buffet boundary is an important aerodynamic parameter which is second only to the lift-drag ratio.
sentences.chinese: 翼型抖振边界是仅次于升阻比的一项重要气动指标。

sentences.english: Background Tea which flavor is fragrant is consumed only second to water .
sentences.chinese: 茶叶气味芬芳，是世界上仅次于水的第二大饮料。

sentences.english: To the writer of real estate advertisements, the autobiographer is the most suspect of prose artists.
sentences.chinese: 自传作者是仅次于房地产广告作者的最可疑的散文家。

sentences.english: Russia is now PepsiCo's biggest market after the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯目前是百事公司仅次于美国的第二大市场。

sentences.english: The next-best solution is to abandon the project altogether.
sentences.chinese: 仅次于最佳的解决方法是放弃全部计划。

sentences.english: India’s economy became the world’s second fastest-growing economy, after China. Led by a thriving information-technology sector, the services sector boomed.
sentences.chinese: 印度成为世界上增长第二快的经济体，仅次于中国。

sentences.english: It is the second-smallest country in the world (after the Vatican City).
sentences.chinese: 它仅次于梵蒂冈，是世界上面积第二小国。

sentences.english: This river's flow into the sea is only second to that one.
sentences.chinese: 这条河流的入海量仅次于那条河流。

sentences.english: Fats or lipids are the second important nutrients next to carbohydrates.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪又叫脂质，它仅次于碳水化合物的第二大营养素。

sentences.english: We ourselves attract more foreign investment than any country but the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 我们所吸引的外资额仅次于美国。

sentences.english: Yale’s endowment is the second largest after Harvard, at twenty-two and a half billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁的捐赠基金仅次于哈佛排第二，达225亿美元。

sentences.english: India's economy became the world's second fastest-growing economy, after China.
sentences.chinese: 印度成为世界上增长第二快的经济体，仅次于中国。

sentences.english: China is the third-largest art market in the world, after the United States and Great Britain.
sentences.chinese: 中国是仅次于美国和英国的第三大艺术品市场。

sentences.english: Airfoil buffeting boundary is an important aerodynamics targets which second only to the lift-drag ratio.
sentences.chinese: 翼型抖振边界是仅次于升阻比的一项重要气动指标。

sentences.english: China is already Australia's second-largest trading partner behind Japan.
sentences.chinese: 中国已经是澳大利亚第二大贸易伙伴，仅次于日本。

definition: to stand above/to occupy an important position/to rank (among the top few)
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
to stand side by side/to be juxtaposed
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
